document_data.name: Mighty Mace
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mighty Mace''' was a popular dining and drinking establishment in [[Daerlun]], [[interior Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite dragon/287/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Shadowdark House|70}}
document_data.Location: This building was on the southeast side of the [[Westmarket]], a large, open marketplace on the [[Street of the Dragon]] in west Daerlun.
document_data.Structure: Of the buildings that formed the perimeter of the Westmarket, the Mighty Mace was the largest.
document_data.Services: The Mighty Mace was open all night and served good food and drink in a cheerful atmosphere of revelry. There were also rooms for rent for those that wanted a comfortable stay or a place to recover from carousing.
